abstract.p: Letter from Marlene Dann, former exec producer of Charles Grodin Show, praises program (Sept 12 comment)

block.p: In your Sept. 12 Public Lives column about Charles Grodin, you say his talk show, ''The Charles Grodin Show,'' received ''some of the most vicious reviews in television.'' In fairness, it should be noted that overwhelmingly, Mr. Grodin received outstanding reviews.

The program also received three Cable Ace Award nominations as best cable show and an additional one for best interviewer. It won a best program nomination every year that it was on the air in which there were Cable Ace Awards.

The program also received three Cable Ace Award nominations as best cable show and an additional one for best interviewer. It won a best program nomination every year that it was on the air in which there were Cable Ace Awards.
In fact, ''The Charles Grodin Show'' was the most honored prime-time program on all of NBC cable during its five-year run.
The writer is former executive producer, ''The Charles Grodin Show.''
